      • getStepVector

        public Vector getStepVector(Position start,
                   Position destination)
                     throws NotALineException
        Returns a step vector that will translate start to destination, and visit all Positions in between.
        Parameters:
        start -
        destination -
        Returns:
        step vector
        Throws:
        NotALineException - will be thrown in case start --> destination is not a valid Queen Move

      • loadConfFile

        public void loadConfFile(java.lang.String path)
        loads map from configuration file. pieces are expressed in color-pieceType format pieceType resolution is as follows: R - Rook N - kNight B - Bishop K - Knight Q - Queen P - Pawn color resolution is as follows: w - White b - Black so, for instance white pawns will be wP

      • pieceFromToken
